ForearmsKneeling.name: Kneeling Wrist Extensor Stretch
ForearmsKneeling.preparation: Kneel on floor or mat. Flex wrists and place tops of hand on floor with fingers pointing toward knees.
ForearmsKneeling.execution: Lean against floor with elbows straight. Hold stretch for 20 seconds.

ForearmsSingle.name: Single Arm Wrist Extensor Stretch
ForearmsSingle.preparation: With palm facing downward, pull wrist and fingers downward toward forearm.
ForearmsSingle.execution: Extend or straighten elbow. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite arm.
ForearmsSingle.comments: Elbow may be extended first, followed by pulling palm toward forearm. Brachioradialis can also be stretched by positioining downward or back (ie external rotation of shoulder)
